SELECT p.permission_name FROM tb_user u JOIN tb_role r ON JSON_CONTAINS(u.role, CAST(r.id AS CHAR)) JOIN tb_permission p ON JSON_CONTAINS(r.permissions, CAST(p.id AS CHAR)) WHERE u.id = #{userId} AND u.status = 1;
select hiredate from tb_user where id=#{userId} and status='1'
select u.name,u.photo,dp.dept_name as deptName from tb_user u left join tb_dept dp on u.dept_id=dp.id where u.id=#{userId} and u.status=1
select id,name,photo from tb_user u where u.status=1 and u.id in #{one}

select u.open_id as openId, u.name, u.photo, u.sex, u.email, u.nickname, u.tel, u.hiredate, d.dept_name as dept, case u.status when 1 then '在职' when 2 then '离职' end as status, (select group_concat(role_name separator ',') from tb_role where JSON_CONTAINS(u.role,convert(id,char ))) as roles from tb_user u left join tb_dept d on u.dept_id=d.id where u.status=1 and u.id=#{userId}
